name: CTE - Employee above Avg Salary
query:
WITH dept_avg_salary AS(
    SELECT
        department,
        AVG(salary) AS avg_salary
    FROM
        `tabEmployee Details`
    GROUP BY 
        department
)

SELECT
    e.emp_name AS "ID:Link/EMployee Details:100",
    e.phone_no AS "Phone:Data:120",
    e.age AS "Age:Int:80",
    e.department AS "Department:Data:120",
    e.salary AS "Salary:Currency:100",
    d.avg_salary AS "Dept Avg Salary:Currency:140"
FROM
    `tabEmployee Details` e
JOIN
    dept_avg_salary d ON e.department = d.department
WHERE
    e.salary > d.avg_salary
ORDER BY
    e.salary DESC
